name: 2.3.0-pre05
body:
- Updated to Xamarin Forms 2.3.x
- Incorporated numerous PR bug fixes
- Updated packages to support .NET Standard projects. See [details here](https://github.com/XLabs/Xamarin-Forms-Labs/wiki/Package-Compatibility) for a complete breakdown

name: 2.3.0-pre01
body:
- Upgrade to Xamarin Forms 2.3.0.107
- Various Small Bug Fixes
- Upgraded SimpleInjector to 3.2.10 (note: support removed from iOS and Android)

name: v2.2.0-pre05 Release
body:
Updated to support Xamarin Forms 2.2 and 2.3
Cleanup of projects and solution to standardize
Merged in numerous bug fixes and PRs from the community

name: 2.2.0 pre
body: Upgrade to work with Xamarin.Forms 2.2.0 stable

name: v1.2.1-pre2
body:
###Changes:
Upgrade to [Xamarin Forms 1.3.0-pre1](https://www.nuget.org/packages/Xamarin.Forms/1.3.0.6275-pre1)

###Bug fixes: 
**iOS:**
Image picker issues 
SMS sending
HybridWebView

**Android:**
Popup
HybridWebView Load Finished

**WP:** 
Internet Connection

name: Bug fixes
body:
ViewModel PropertyChanged fix
Breaking Change Resolver will now return InvalidOperationException instead of NullReferenceException

name: v.1.2.0
body:
Several Bug fixes

New controls

Charting Controls

name: Bug fixes, new controls, update for Xamarin forms 1.2.2 stable
body:
Bug fixes 
Some new alpha controls : 
Update for Xamarin.Forms 1.2.2 stable

name: Fixes and updated to work with v.1.2.2 of Xamarin Forms
body:
Fixed some bugs.
Updated missing methods in PhoneService
Added SoundService.
Added GridView for IOS.

name: v1.1.0
body: This version was mainly targeting our new Nugets structure as well as bug fixes on services and controls.

name: v1.1.0-Beta4 Beta release
body:
Nugets v1.1.0-Beta4 release should solve some issues with dependencies.
ServiceStack Serialization plugin was removed.

name: v1.1.0-Beta2 Beta release
body:
Breaking changes on the nuget packages and fixes broken plugin packages.
Fixing namespace consistency.
Deprecated RelayCommand.
Lots of bug fixes on controls , services and mvvm helpers.
